info.title: Determining the status of a running kernel

abstract.para: The topic describes how to determine the status of a running kernel.

topic.para: Loading an unsupported kernel module can taint the kernel. To find out if your kernel is tainted or not, run the command:

If the command outputs a 0, the kernel is not tainted and can be supported by &suse;. If the command returns any other number, the kernel is tainted. The returned number is a combined number of all kernel taint flags.
